36.ara-name: كتاب الزهد عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Safwan bin Assal narrated that a Bedouin with a loud voice and said:" O Muhammad! A man loves the people but does not catch up to them (in deeds)." So the Messenger of Allah(s.a.w) said: "A man shall be with whomever he loves

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ أَنَّ الْمَرْءَ مَعَ مَنْ أَحَبَّ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About A Man Shall Be With Whom He Loves
